sentences.en: ...the players considered to be the immortals of the game.
sentences.cn: …被认为是该运动项目不朽人物的运动员们。

sentences.en: Had we yielded, the system would have been immortal.
sentences.cn: 倘使我们当时作了让步, 这个体系就会永远存在下去.

sentences.en: He believed his immortal soul was in peril.
sentences.cn: 他认为他不死的灵魂有堕入地狱的危险。

sentences.en: Maybe my work is not immortal, but it will live for a while.
sentences.cn: 也许我的作品不能流芳百世，但它能流传一阵子。

sentences.en: Money didn't last forever but neither was one immortal!
sentences.cn: 钱有花完的那一天,人可是也不会永远活着!

sentences.en: Or is Mount Tai the immortal Confucius?
sentences.cn: 泰山就是永远的孔子 吗 ?

sentences.en: Plato believed that the soul is immortal.
Some people believe that the spirit is immortal.
Someone believed that the soul is immortal.
The heroes of the people are immortal.
The pharaohs were considered gods and therefore immortal.
sentences.cn: 法老们被视为神灵，且长生不死。

sentences.en: The wild cocoa tree is effectively immortal.
sentences.cn: 野生可可树实际上是不会死的.

sentences.en: They believe the soul is immortal, grounding this belief on the Divine nature of the human spirit.
sentences.cn: 基于对人类精神神圣性的信仰，他们认为灵魂是永恒的。

sentences.en: Though Verrazano is by no means considered to be a great explorer, his name will probably remain immortal, for on Novenber 21 st , 1964, the greatest bridge in the world was named after him.
sentences.cn: 虽然维拉扎诺不能被认为是一位伟大的探险家, 但他的名字将有可能流芳百世, 因为在1964年11月21日, 一座世界上最大的桥梁以他的名字命名了.

sentences.en: Well, Hareton's aspect was the ghost of my immortal love.
sentences.cn: 是的, 哈里顿的模样是我那不朽的爱情的幻影.

sentences.en: You pretend the female immortal, and I pretend Cinderella.
sentences.cn: 你装仙姑, 我装灰姑娘.

words.tran_cn: 使不灭；使名垂千古，使不朽

trans.tran_cn: 不死的，永恒的，不朽的，神的，流芳百世的
神仙，流芳百世的人，不朽的作家
trans.tran_en: An immortal is someone who will be remembered for a long time
